trans-unit.resname: LEA·1 | Animate Wall | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant Wall\nEnchanted Wall can attack as though it didn't have defender.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物可以像不是墙一般地攻击。

trans-unit.source: Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各选择若干由其操控的地，其数量等同于所有牌手中操控地最少之牌手的地数量，然后牺牲其余的地。各牌手也以此法弃牌与牺牲生物。

trans-unit.resname: LEA·4 | Benalish Hero | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

由你操控之未横置的生物得+0/+2。

trans-unit.source: If you would draw a card during your draw step, instead you may skip that draw. If you do, until your next turn, you can't be attacked except by creatures with flying and/or islandwalk.
trans-unit.target: 略过抓一张牌：直到你的下回合开始以前，只有具飞行或海岛行者异能的生物能够攻击你。你只能在抓牌阶段时使用此异能，并且每回合只能使用一次。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, CARDNAME deals damage to that player equal to the number of Swamps they control.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，CARDNAME对该牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于由他所操控的沼泽数量。（维持步骤是在重置之后、抓牌之前的时段。）

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if CARDNAME is in your graveyard with three or more creature cards above it, you may put CARDNAME onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段，如果CARDNAME在你的坟墓场中，并且至少有三张生物牌在它上面，则你可以将CARDNAME放回场中。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的沼泽数量。

trans-unit.source:
Enchant creature
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {4}. If the player does, untap the creature.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，横置受此结界的生物。\n受此结界的生物不能在它操控者的重置阶段被重置。该玩家可以在他的维持阶段中额外支付o4以重置此生物。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在回合结束时，如果场上没有生物，则牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: {B}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
trans-unit.target: oB：CARDNAME对每个生物和牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LEA·121 | Plague Rats | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures named CARDNAME on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量及防御力皆等于场上CARDNAME的数目。

trans-unit.source: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

LEA·132 | Wall of Bone | Card Text | Paragraph 2

{B}: Regenerate CARDNAME. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

trans-unit.resname: LEA·136 | Word of Command | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；“箴言”显然是先前的译者试图用ONS的五张箴言Words of …对译，但这是错误的。Word of在早期版本中普遍的翻译是“XX咒”，例如MMQ：爆碎咒 Word of Blasting，TSP：攫灵咒 Word of Seizing。

trans-unit.resname: LEA·137 | Zombie Master | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Other Zombie creatures have swampwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)\nOther Zombies have "{B}: Regenerate this permanent."

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature has mountainwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals X damage to any target. If it's a creature, it can't be regenerated this turn, and if it would die this turn, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成X点伤害。 该生物于本回合中不能重生。 若该生物于本回合中将被置入坟墓场，则改为将它移出对战。

trans-unit.resname: LEA·236 | Clockwork Beast | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with seven +1/+0 counters on it.\nAt end of combat, if CARDNAME attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it.\n{X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on CARDNAME. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on CARDNAME to be greater than seven. Activate only during your upkeep.
trans-unit.target:
当CARDNAME进场时，放置七个+1/+0指示物在其上。
在任何战斗结束时，若CARDNAME在该战斗中曾攻击或阻挡，则移去一个指示物。
oX，ocT：放置X个 +1/+0指示物在CARDNAME上。
CARDNAME上的指示物不可超过七个。你只可在你的维持阶段中使用此异能。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；卡图看起来还是更像碑

trans-unit.resname: LEA·239 | Crystal Rod | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当有牌手使用蓝色咒语时，你可以支付{1}。若你如此做，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: LEA·241 | Dingus Egg | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个地从场上置入坟墓场时，CARDNAME对该地的操控者造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LEA·242 | Disrupting Scepter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate only during your turn.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}：目标牌手弃一张牌。 你只可以于你的回合中使用此异能。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: LEA·244 | Gauntlet of Might | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: LEA·245 | Glasses of Urza | Card Name
LEA·245 | Glasses of Urza | Card Text | Paragraph 1
LEA·246 | Helm of Chatzuk | Card Name
LEA·246 | Helm of Chatzuk | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Target creature gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
trans-unit.target: o1，ocT：目标生物获得结合异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: LEA·247 | Howling Mine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if CARDNAME is untapped, that player draws an additional card.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的抓牌步骤开始时，若CARDNAME未横置，则该牌手额外抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LEA·248 | Icy Manipulator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: LEA·250 | Iron Star | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当有牌手使用红色咒语时，你可以支付{1}。若你如此作，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LEA·251 | Ivory Cup | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当有牌手使用白色咒语时，你可以支付{1}。若你如此做，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LEA·252 | Jade Monolith | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that source deals that damage to you instead.
trans-unit.target: o1：选择一个伤害来源，当此来源下一次在本回合中将要对目标生物造成伤害时，改为对你造成伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LEA·253 | Jade Statue | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}: CARDNAME becomes a 3/6 Golem artifact creature until end of combat. Activate only during combat.
trans-unit.target: {2}：CARDNAME成为3/6神器生物直到战斗结束。 此异能只能在战斗中使用。

trans-unit.resname: LEA·254 | Jayemdae Tome | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME attacks each combat if able.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked by Walls.

trans-unit.resname: LEA·257 | Library of Leng | Card Name
LEA·257 | Library of Leng | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You have no maximum hand size.

trans-unit.resname: LEA·257 | Library of Leng | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If an effect causes you to discard a card, discard it, but you may put it on top of your library instead of into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当有任何效应强迫你弃牌时，你可选择不弃掉该牌，而将牌放置于牌库顶端。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；由卡图和背景叙述可知此处的Living Wall是「血肉构成的墙」。

trans-unit.resname: LEA·259 | Mana Vault | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME doesn't untap during your untap step.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME于你的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: LEA·259 | Mana Vault | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以支付{4}。若你如此作，则重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: LEA·259 | Mana Vault | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your draw step, if CARDNAME is tapped, it deals 1 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: 在你的抓牌步骤开始时，若CARDNAME已横置，则它对你造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LEA·259 | Mana Vault | Card Text | Paragraph 4

trans-unit.source: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
trans-unit.target: 力量大于或等于3的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不可重置。

trans-unit.source: {5}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying named Wasp. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME未横置，则牌手于其重置步骤中所重置的地不能多于一个。
